about_the_game:
In Echoes Afterfall, you take on the role of a Reclaimer, venturing into the Echoes—mysterious and perilous zones that emerged after the fall of civilization. Your mission is to recover resources and relics crucial for society’s rebirth. Each foray offers random loot opportunities and unexpected dangers, and you must return to the outpost to sell what you find. Failure to meet the requested quota results in reassessment by the Governor’s regime.

Your bunker serves as your operational headquarters, a hub where you can manage your resources and prepare for upcoming expeditions. Use the loot you gather to unlock upgrades and purchase better equipment, customizing your bunker to support your missions more effectively.

Echoes Afterfall is a cooperative horror survival game where you team up with up to three other players. Share resources, strategize your expeditions, and manage the unpredictable dangers that lie ahead. Effective teamwork, resource management, and maintaining your sanity are key to completing your missions and progressing in this harsh new world.

In the Echoes, you’ll encounter diverse enemies and challenges. Navigate procedurally generated dungeons to find treasures, uncover secrets, and manage your sanity as you delve deeper into these twisted zones. Your success hinges on balancing risk and reward, collecting loot, and returning to the bunker before it runs out of energy.

Are you ready to take the plunge into the Echoes? Equip yourself, loot, sell, survive.

Serve the Governor’s vision, ensure your survival, and help reshape this broken world.

content_descriptors.notes: Players characters may be killed in various ways, including mutilation and dismemberment.
